DOC.brief_summary: In randomise control cross-over study investigate whether intrathoracic pressure change induce simulated obstructive apnoea hypopnoea trigger premature supraventricular ventricular contraction well atrial fibrillation patient paroxysmal atrial fibrillation .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Simulated Obstructive Apnoea Hypopnoea Heart Rhythm Patients With Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age 1875 year History ECGdocumented paroxysmal atrial fibrillation within last 12 month currently sinus rhythm Informed consent Exclusion criterion : Mental physical disability precluding inform consent compliance protocol Amiodarone Dronedarone medication Previous radiofrequency ablation atrial fibrillation Severe structural heart disease
